title: [Large-scale] Analysis of Language MOOC (LMOOC) Research Trends and Project-Based Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education methodologies and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A Course for Current Elementary Teachers Analyzing LMOOC Research Trends and Applying Them to Science Curriculum-Integrated Project Design

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more key themes of LMOOC research (learner characteristics, instructional models, design elements)
Learners apply two or more educational characteristics of LMOOC (engagement maintenance strategies, assessment methods) when designing science-integrated projects
Learners predict three potential issues that may arise when designing small-scale online language learning based on case analysis

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Jamboard)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
